var get_location=function get_location(callback){if(navigator.geolocation&&navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition){navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(function(position){var pos={lat:position.coords.latitude,lng:position.coords.longitude};callback(pos);return pos;});}else{alert("your browser does not support geolocation or your device does not allow geolocaton in this browser");// Browser doesn't support Geolocation
console.log("error: Browser doesn't support Geolocation");}};export{get_location};
